skills.name: Crushing Blow
skills.description: Smashes the enemy and stuns the target for 1 turn with a 30% chance. The damage of this skill is proportionate to your MAX HP and this attack will increase your Attack Speed for 2 turns if it lands as a Critical Hit.

skill_effect.name: Stun
skill_effect.description: Enemy is stunned and immobilized for a number of turns

skills.multiplier_formula: 1.1*<mark>ATK</mark> + 0.18*<mark data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="Attacker's HP in raw hit points">MAX HP</mark>

skills.name: Defend
skills.description: Decreases the inflicted damage to 0 for 3 turns when your ally is attacked and receives 50% of the original damage. Instantly recovers a turn, afterwards.

skill_effect.name: Defend
skill_effect.description: Monster that applies Hug will take damage from monster with effect. Does not protect against debuffs.

skills.name: Trick of Water
skills.description: Attacks all enemies with a spell that summons the power of water. This attack has an 80% chance to decrease the target's Attack Speed for 2 turns. The damage of this skill is proportionate to your MAX HP.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Damage +10%
Cooltime Turn -1

skill_effect.name: AOE
skill_effect.description: Applies skill to more than one target

skills.multiplier_formula: 0.28*<mark data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="Attacker's HP in raw hit points">MAX HP</mark>
